scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm exec tsc --build && pnpm run postbuild
scripts.generate: pnpm run generate:coingecko && pnpm run generate:coincap
scripts.generate:coingecko: pnpm run build && pnpm exec tsx src/adapters/coingecko/generate.ts
scripts.generate:coincap: pnpm run build && pnpm exec tsx src/adapters/coincap/generate.ts
scripts.postbuild: pnpm run postbuild:esm && pnpm run postbuild:cjs
